title: Félix Lambey
text:
Félix Lambey (born 15 March 1994) is a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a> who currently plays for <a href="Lyon%20OU">Lyon</a> and <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">France</a>.
International career.
Lambey was called up to the French national team for the first time ahead of France's opening <a href="2018%20Six%20Nations%20Championship">2018 Six Nations Championship</a> match against Ireland.
